alfredsnippet.name: Creates an object composed of the properties the given function returns truthy for. The function is invoked with two arguments: (value, key).
alfredsnippet.snippet:
const pickBy = (obj, fn) =>
  Object.keys(obj)
    .filter(k => fn(obj[k], k))
    .reduce((acc, key) => ((acc[key] = obj[key]), acc), {});
